channel.title: InYourBones Daily Music News
channel.description: Top 5 daily music stories handpicked by InYourBones

item.title: Amaarae Announces New Album Black Star, Shares Video for New Song “S.M.O.”: Watch
item.description: 🌟 Dive into the colorful world of @amaarae with her new album 'Black Star' and vibrant music video for "S.M.O." 🎶✨ #Amaarae #BlackStar

item.title: Watch Miley Cyrus and Beyoncé Perform ‘II Most Wanted’ for the First Time
item.description: 🔥 Queen B and Miley bringing the heat with 'II Most Wanted' debut performance! 🎶✨ #MusicLegends #FierceCollab

item.title: Homeboy Sandman & Sonnyjim Announce New Album Soli Deo Gloria: Hear “Sound And Fury”
item.description: 🎶 New vibes alert! Homeboy Sandman & Sonnyjim drop a teaser from upcoming album Soli Deo Gloria. Hit play now! 🎧💥 #MusicNews

item.title: Pixies Perform ‘Night The Zombies Came’ Single ‘Motorroller’ on Kimmel
item.description: Pixies rock the late-night stage with 'Motorroller' on Kimmel! 🔥🎸 Who else is feeling those spooky vibes? 👻 #Pixies #KimmelPerformance

item.title: CMAT Shares “The Jamie Oliver Petrol Station,” Talks Viral “Woke Macarena” Dance
item.description: 🎶 Get ready to groove with CMAT's new track "The Jamie Oliver Petrol Station" and learn about her viral "Woke Macarena" dance! 💃 #CMAT #NewMusicDiscoveries
